    Goals

    Questions:

    • Each individual awareness
    • What do you want? Information or advocacy? Information
    • Do you want to learn or you want to do something about it?
    • What is the goal?
    • How many activities over the year? One big event or many small event
    • What is mandatory?

    Requirements:

    • Attend 3 meeting at least
    • Attend activities
